title: Record breaker Salt wants to be world's best
summary: Phil Salt has set his sights on becoming the "best in the world" as a T20 opener after smashing a record-breaking century in England's 146-run victory over South Africa.

title: Ram ends EV pickup truck plans
summary: Stellantis, the parent company of Ram, said Friday that it will no longer develop a battery-electric full-size pickup. The company cited low demand for full-size battery-electric trucks as the primary reason.

title: Makin has to settle for bronze at World Champs
summary: Callum Makin has to settle for a bronze medal at the World Boxing Championships after a semi-final defeat in the men's 75kg division.

title: Leigh beat St Helens to book home play-off spot
summary: Leigh Leopards guarantee a home play-off tie with a 28-10 victory against St Helens that secures a top-four finish.

title: Maresca 'hasn't seen Sterling or Disasi since start of season'
summary: Chelsea manager Enzo Maresca says he hasn't seen either Raheem Sterling or Axel Disasi since the season began and they will remain in the "bomb squad".

title: Nine-man Leverkusen beat Frankfurt for first win post Ten Hag
summary: A brace from Alejandro Grimaldo helps Bayer Leverkusen overcome the sending off of captain Robert Andrich and Ezequiel Fernandez to beat Eintracht Frankfurt 3-1 in the Bundesliga, in new manager Kasper Hjulmand's first game in charge following the sacking of Erik ten Hag.

title: Newcastle start Red Bull era with Prem Rugby Cup win
summary: Newcastle Red Bulls kick off their new era with a comfortable 26-14 win against Harlequins in the Prem Rugby Cup.

title: Record-breaking Salt helps England to historic win against South Africa
summary: Phil Salt hits 141 while Jos Buttler adds 83 as England score 304-2 - their highest ever total in a T20 international - before bowling South Africa out for 158, to ease to an historic win at Old Trafford in the second T20 and level the series at 1-1.

title: Via shrugs off tepid open to end first day of trading slightly above IPO price
summary: Transit tech software startup Via had its IPO debut on Friday, starting at below offering price before rising to close at nearly $50.

title: Wigan thump Castleford to clinch top-two finish
summary: Wigan Warriors clinch a Super League top-two finish and a home semi-final with an 11-try win against lowly Castleford Tigers.

title: Century for Salt on record-breaking night for England
summary: Phil Salt scores England's fastest T20 century on a record-breaking night at Old Trafford as the hosts level the series with an 146-run win over South Africa.

title: Century for Salt on record-breaking night for England
summary: Phil Salt scores England's fastest T20 century on a record-breaking night at Old Trafford as the hosts level the series with an 146-run win over South Africa.

title: 'Breathtaking batting' - Salt hits record-breaking 141 for England
summary: Phil Salt hits a record-breaking, unbeaten 141 from 60 balls, the highest individual T20 score by an England cricketer, to guide the home side to a huge 146-run win against South Africa in the second T20 at Old Trafford.

title: Everton eye bargain Grealish deal - Saturday's gossip
summary: Everton hopeful of signing Manchester City's Jack Grealish for less than Â£50m, Manchester United, Liverpool and Chelsea chase Crystal Palace's Adam Wharton, Fulham consider Harry Wilson future, plus more.

title: Norrie & Fery put GB in control in Davis Cup tie
summary: Cameron Norrie and Arthur Fery won their Davis Cup matches to give Great Britain a 2-0 lead over Poland and a strong chance of reaching next year's qualifiers.

title: Apple TV+ is about to kick off four weeks straight of big premieres
summary: Apple TV+ has had its strongest year ever, and that only looks set to continue this fall thanks to a packed lineup of new shows and movies. These next four weeks offer a great taste of that, with big new premieres dropping every week. moreâ¦
